author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police are on the lookout for three students of Government Arts College at Kattukottai in Attur Taluk for assaulting two of their college mates here on Thursday.

It is said that three students of the college assaulted Naveen and Vanraj, both second year students while travelling in bus on Wednesday.

Both were admitted to Government Hospital in Attur.

On Wednesday, other students attempted to block the Attur – Salem National Highway, demanding the arrest of three students for assaulting the two.
title: Search on for three students for assaulting college mates
